Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

As you my have allready guessed my name is Lukas. I live in Germany and I bought the game shortly after 1.0. I was reading in this forum for a while now and now I've finally created an account! I'm not really new to KSP, on Steam I have 235 h played but I've also played without Steam some RSS and 64K. I was on all planets and moons but I didn't returned form eve and tylo . I also built some SSTOs but I think that flying a rocket is easier! Before I played the game I was a little bit interested in space travel and this stuff but now I'm very interested in it! So far I really like the game but I have to say that I use tons of mods! After the first 3-4 days I installed KER and currently I have so many mods that the game crashes randomly every hour or so. But thats ok because without mods it runs perfect . As mentioned above I've also played some RSS but this was so buggy that I stopped playing it . And thats pretty much it.

Welcome to the forums!

Sounds like you've accomplished quite a bit already. Have any screenshots of your favorite missions or crafts? I'm sure quite a few people would be interested to see what you've done with their own eyes.

Make yourself at home!

I don't have prictures of my manned landings because my ships all look very ugly .But I've some pictures of my SSTO spaceplane and my Gilly Outpost.

The cargo bay can be replaced with a crew quarter but it can only get into LKO.

And this is my Gilly Outpost:

I've done this for a contract which payed 1.2 Mio or so. I wanted to grab with to claw into the surface to "land" but that didn't worked so I landed it sideways. Now they have to get out through the lab .

"235 hours played"

"Joined slightly after 1.0"

and i'm sitting here playing since 0.23 and i barely have 100 hours logged
Good to see you. Welcome to the forums
